LightningComponentBundle.description: Experience Cloud wrapper for Indicator Bundle. Delegates to indicatorBundle and adapts context safely for community pages.

property.name: bundleName
property.label: Indicator Bundle DeveloperName
property.description: Enter the DeveloperName of the Indicator Bundle (CMDT).

property.name: mappedField
property.label: (Optional) Mapped Id Field
property.description: Provide the API name of a field on this object which holds a Record Id or Relationship Id.

property.name: showFooter
property.label: Show footer when using Mapped Id Field

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id (optional)
property.description: If not supplied, wrapper will try to read recordId from the page URL.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name (optional)
property.description: If not supplied, wrapper will try to read objectApiName from the page URL.
